content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-59.5, -111.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (-59.5, -111.5)
- Boiler at Position (-46.5, -122.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (-68.5, -95.5)
- Connected by PipeGroups and Small Electric Poles to distribute power

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to an Iron Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) for smelting iron ore

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) and (6.0, -62.0) for smelting copper ore
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) to move items between entities
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) for storage

### Power Distribution Network
Consists of:
- Small Electric Poles connecting various entities to the power grid

### Lab at Position (unknown)
- Lab with no research in progress, requires automation science packs

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Entities without Required Items
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. For example, crafting Small Electric Poles requires wood and copper cables.

### Errors when Entities are Not Receiving Power
- Verify that all entities requiring electricity are properly connected to the power network with sufficient power supply.

### Errors with Full Inventory or Output
- Regularly check and manage the inventory of chests and furnaces to prevent them from becoming full, which can halt production processes.
